title: b5
body: why pay $$ on lol when you report afk's, troll's, feeder's and just bad players!! yes and all will say " its you , the only common dominator " bla bla, " ive seen this all b4. if riot want to help the game they should ask someone like me , 3 accounts all champs / most skins / over $ 1000 each account sha longer chrisboii and twounique. most of my accounts are 50% > win rate yet I cant get out of b5 on 2 accounts because of the above, yes and all will say " its you , the only common dominator " bla bla, " ive seen this all before. so over lol its not funny. ban my accounts if you must, idgaflying f. look at my history , its a jok, endofdays is coming for lol.

replies.body:
Half of the time I've seen, people complaining about trolls, afks, feeders, ragers, aren't doing much themselves to stop the team breakdowns. That is, they are raging at their teammates who are 0-2 in lane, making them play worse. I'm not saying that you are doing this, though your shoddy English skills don't help much.
if you keep a positive attitude throughout, your team will feel more relaxed, YOU will feel more relaxed, and you will play better. And there will be less trolls and ragers. I just got promoted to B4 yesterday, and there were very few angry/careless people in my games.

>your shoddy English skills don't help much.

Not everyone has to speak perfect English to be considered a good person.

I mean, like, what if you got beat up by some French dudes because you mispronounced "Baguette" or something?
